reviewText:
I bought it as a gift.  Feedback is very entertaining.  Brigitte Lahaie was in her 30's.  She, in the film, is running a high-end whore house in a mansion.  Disguised as an art school, she hires 2 male teachers and 4 female students.  Sex Education presenting live as an art in various
chapters.  Within the timetable, she herself and 2 part-time males also join in this live show as a stimulus.  Quite a ball game.  In a comedy ending, a police official knowingly and smiling keeps his eyes shut.

Last night I downloaded this totally by accident, but watched it till the end. This sexy and amusing French erotic fantasy by Frdric Lansac (aka Claude Mulot, who tragically died quite young), is from around 1980, and provides everything that the modern porn industry lacks: a story line, a beautiful setting (high-class boarding school with 4 gorgeous "students"), and lots of fun, if this is your "thing." I proves it's possible to make a REALLY sexy and yet tasteful film in this genre. Too bad there aren't more like this.
...and I am someone who NEVER downloads movies: I have over a thousand good DVD in my collection.
